Roles.title: UX Researcher
Roles.description: Conducts user research to gather insights and feedback to improve the design and usability of products.

Roles.title: Senior UX Researcher
Roles.description: Leads complex research projects, mentors junior researchers, and provides actionable insights to guide design decisions.

Roles.title: Principal UX Researcher
Roles.description: Oversees the entire UX research strategy, ensures the alignment of research activities with business goals, and drives high-impact projects.

Roles.title: Lead UX Researcher
Roles.description: Manages a team of UX researchers, coordinates research efforts across projects, and ensures the quality and relevance of research outcomes.

Roles.title: UX Research Manager
Roles.description: Manages the UX research team, develops research plans, and collaborates with cross-functional teams to integrate user insights into product development.

Roles.title: User Research Specialist
Roles.description: Specializes in specific research methods and techniques to gather deep insights into user behaviors and preferences.

Roles.title: UX Research Coordinator
Roles.description: Coordinates research activities, schedules sessions, manages participant recruitment, and ensures smooth execution of research plans.

Roles.title: UX Research Analyst
Roles.description: Analyzes research data, interprets findings, and provides detailed reports and recommendations to improve user experience.

Roles.title: User Experience Strategist
Roles.description: Develops long-term strategies for user research and experience, aligning them with business objectives and product goals.

Roles.title: User Experience Ethnographer
Roles.description: Conducts ethnographic studies to understand users' behaviors and cultures, providing deep contextual insights for product design.
